summary: Improved Clothes Iron (one decade less old)
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------
readme_improved_clothesiron_v1.0.txt
-------------------------------------
PLEASE DO NOT DISTRIBUTE THE MOD EVER WITHOUT THIS README!
-------------------------------------

hi friends! :)

i made this mod to give something back to the great nexus community.
my name is calav3ra, and you can get in contact with me by emailing 
to: jonnyhope AT gmx DOT net. my personal website is found under:
http://www.calav3ras.de/ but it isnt much related to skyrim at all.

i look forward to see this mod incorporated into modpacks, as there
are too few at the moment. please ask me via email if you want to 
incorporate it into your own modpack, as i want to keep track where
it goes with.

my mods:
\"improved clothes iron\"
\"improved practice dummy\"
\"improved lantern\"
\"improved cast iron pots\"

INSTALL: As always: drag or copy the \"textures\" folder into 
your Skyrim\\Data folder!

Thanks for listening.
Lets make Skyrim greater each day! :)
-------------------------------------
creation date: 12/12/2011
-------------------------------------
author: calav3ra
